name: Shooting Stars
description:
Shooting Stars is a game where you control your space ship by pure recoil. Shoot and survive the arena as long as possible and go for the high score!

Show us how well you can play in the comments!

Controls:

Press your mouse to fire in the opposite direction of where you want to go. Release your mouse to regain health. Blue fields increase your health regen, yellow fields increase your rate of fire and magenta fields increase your damage output.

Online WebGL version: http://www.verzijl.com/peter/game-downloads/shootingstars/
